resources: Cat Dog & Bird Pedia About us Cat Dog & Bird Pedia // Layout Tap on picture to open gallery List of Breeds Back Cat Dog Bird List of Cat Breeds List of Dog Breeds List of Bird Breeds // Data kucing Angora Turkey Originated in Ankara, Turkey. It has a very distinct characteristics of long and smooth fur Bengali England This breed is a result of cross breeding between Asian Leopard and domestic cat in England Birman Burma/Myanmar The Birman is a long-haired, colour-pointed cat distinguished by a silky coat, deep blue eyes, and contrasting white "gloves" on each paw. Persian Iran The Persian cat is a long-haired breed of cat characterized by its round face and short muzzle. It is also known as the "Persian Longhair" in English-speaking countries. Siamese Thailand The Siamese cat is one of the first distinctly recognized breeds of Asian cat. Derived from the Wichianmat landrace, one of several varieties of cat native to Thailand, the original Siamese became one of the most popular breeds in Europe and North America in the 19th century. Siberian Russia The Siberian is a centuries-old landrace of domestic cat in Russia and recently developed as a formal breed with standards promulgated the world over since the late 1980s. Siberians vary from medium to medium-large in size. // Data anjing Bulldog England The Bulldog, also known as the English Bulldog or British Bulldog, is a medium-sized dog breed. It is a muscular, hefty dog with a wrinkled face and a distinctive pushed-in nose. The Kennel Club, the American Kennel Club, and the United Kennel Club oversee breeding records. Husky Alaska,Siberia,Finland (snowy region) A husky is a sled dog used in the polar regions. One can differentiate huskies from other dog types by their fast pulling-style. Modern racing huskies (also known as Alaskan huskies) represent an ever-changing crossbreed of the fastest dogs (the Alaskan Malamute, by contrast, pulled heavier loads at a slower speed). Kintamani Indonesia The Kintamani or the Kintamani-Bali Dog is a dog native to the Indonesian island of Bali and originated from the Kintamani region. It is a popular pet for the Balinese and locally Bali\'s only official breed. Samoyed Russia The Samoyed is a breed of medium-sized herding dogs with thick, white, double-layer coats. They are a spitz-type dog which takes its name from the Samoyedic peoples of Siberia. Shepherd Germany The German Shepherd is a breed of medium to large-sized working dog that originated in Germany. Shiba Japan The Shiba Inu is a breed of hunting dog from Japan. A small-to-medium breed, it is the smallest of the six original and distinct spitz breeds of dog native to Japan. A small, alert, and agile dog that copes very well with mountainous terrain and hiking trails, the Shiba Inu was originally bred for hunting. // Data burung Cendrawasih Indonesia Cendrawasih is usually found in Indonesia such as in eastern Papua, Papua New Guinea, torres strait islands, and eastern Australia. Owl Seluruh dunia kecuali antartika This bird belongs to the group of wild birds (carnivores, meat eaters) and is a night animal (nocturnal). In all, there are about 222 known species, which spread around the world except Antarctica, most of Greenland, and some remote islands.. Garuda Hindu It is one of the anthropomorphic-mythological creatures in Hinduism, Buddhism, and Jainism. Dove Indonesia Pigeons and pigeons are stocky-bodied birds with short necks and short slender beaks with watery ceres. Parrot Indonesia Parrots are many animals. Its uniqueness becomes its own attraction for bird lovers. Bangkok Indonesia Medium-sized birds of one genus of crooked beak birds, cockatoos (Cacatua). The orange-crested cockatoo is the smallest subspecies of the four subspecies of the yellow-crested cockatoo.
